title: [Question] 2025 branch change cutoffs
content: Can anyone give me this year branch change cutoffs for rr cse,aiml,ece

comments.body:
CSE-9.04 (25 Seats vacant before change of branch counseling)
AIML-8.38 (15)
I have one question - why is it so low do less people apply for branch change or there are less people getting these cgpa?

Cutoffs are generally high every year , 9.04 was probably lowest in pes history ig . Reason:
1. Our kcet counselling happened late and was postponed multiple times due to  medical scam last yr , due to this  1st year classes were postponed and pessat seats got vacant coz people opted for other colleges through other exams like cometk etc .
2. This is just my analysis people can differ
Majority thought that there would be relative grading in 2nd sem, so people prepared according to it but it eventually got backfired 2nd sem average got less than 1st ,which reduced cgpa.
